doc.p: This website is run by your institution.
We want as many people as possible to be able to use this website. For example, that means you should be able to:
doc.li: change colours, contrast levels and fonts
zoom in up to 200% without the text spilling off the screen
navigate most of the website using just a keyboard
navigate most of the website using speech recognition software
listen to most of the website using a screen reader
doc.p: We've also made the text as simple as possible to understand.
AbilityNet has advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.
doc.h2: What to do if you cannot access parts of this website
doc.p: Please contact your institution's help desk, who will assist or pass on your request to their service provider.
